Blog.post: sigh..wat a disappointment =( went Maju Camp for IPPT today. guess wat? haha..lol, i fail. slacked for too long, neva train, should have guessed my failure for today. anyway, the PTI encik there was fun and frenly with his long cane, was a master warrant, chat with me in hokkien. not like those evil PTI i have came across. hahaha RT coming soon, wish me luck ba. >_<

both my online games, gunbound 坦克宝贝 and fairyland 童话 server got hacked. sianz man... 2 days already... still cannot play. haiz... time to search for new online games, or maybe not, cuz i got tonnes of PS2 games haven touch or completed yet. arc of lad, resident evil voronica and fatal frame 2 all play half way, =( no time sia!!

yum yum..the hainanese chicken rice at pricep street was delicious. they also have other dishes. some of my fav are beancurd hotplate, fried porkchop with potato, kanggong with balajang and not forgetting my fried cai po egg. shinz recommended, go have a try, is at pricep street right till the end, chin chin eating place =)

sigh =( ..went to dreamcars show yesterday at expo..kind of disappointed. not much cars really. and the best thing, my fren digi cam went out of batt...and not much really lots of race queen as they say in newspaper >_< sad sad man..

juz started on my new online game darkeden 2 days ago..yes vampire for sure ^^ time to wipe out all the slayers. but i'm weak haha lol.. me newbie vampire only. yipee..gotten my 2 teeth rank today. sigh.. 3 teeth rank seem so far away... arg..

my com has been down for 5 days due to serious viruses. damn tat donk and korgo virus!! arg..my com has been formatted and clear of viruses now. yipee, can surf back chinese site already, and no more irriating script prob. ^^ woohoo..

i juz celebrate my 24th birthday yesterday. it was a fun and enjoyable day. thanks for all the friends i know tat came to celebrate with me for the pass 2 days. ^^ sigh.. sad man, i'm older by 1 yr again. old man le.. hohoho..

2 days ago was liling bday, we went out and have fun, but the director aka fatimah neva come. kind of disappointed. there are some weird problems happening, on a girl, i shall not say it out. the 2 person who were with me, u know who u r, maybe we can help to slove this girl problem. seeing her with lots of probs juz make mine heart pain =(

nowadays been busy with work, hardly got time for my darkeden game. i'm have been stuck in lvl 81 for quite some time. still got a long way to become baronet...sigh...=( can someone give me some free lvl..lol

awww.. how did i do it?? my highest score was only 117. wth is wrong with me?? sigh, lack of training..bloody heck still can't understand why...so ashame, my friend who juz started on bowling today..even trash me in 2nd match. zzzz....

went to watch the village with my pri sch fren liling and shijie, erm..wat to say..not bad lah...but too boring loh, cuz the show was actually abt a lie made by the village elders. and guess wat? somewhere near the ending, when one of the ranger went to take medicine, the ranger superior was actually mr bean.. o_O or did i see wrongly?? anyway looking forward for more horror movies ^^.

wow so happy..get to see my pri sch friends yesterday. qiuyan, liling, siyun, siling and shijie. all still look the same no change ^^. so nice..we went back to our pri sch front gate, sit down and chit chat there..but too bad its closed, we can't get in and take photos. well..quite nice ^-^
